title: Game in React
des: This is a 'drag and drop building' game to spark your imagination. Become the Architect of your own imaginary world.It was built as the final front end project for the course Tech for women at Sundsgården.

title: Income & Expense tracker
des: An app that can keep track of your income, expenses and calculate the summary and show your total balance. Built on: Javascript only

title: Genesis Portfolio
des: One of the first projects I did. Doing this assignment we learned how to use Sass, using variables and mixins and how to use flexbox and grids. A front end project for the Tech for women course at Sundsgården. Built on: HTML, CSS, Figma
